label: subject orientation concept scheme
definition: a SKOS concept scheme for orientation

label: unspecified orientation
definition: orientation is not known because it is not specified

label: anterior side
definition: view of the side towards the head or forward end of the organism

label: posterior side
definition: view of the side away from the head or towards the rear end of the organism

label: lateral side
definition: view of the side perpendicular to the main axis of the organism

label: right side
definition: view of the right side of a whole bilaterally symmetric organism

label: left side
definition: view of the left side of a whole bilaterally symmetric organism

label: dorsal side
definition: view of the side dorsal to the frontal plane of a bilaterally symmetric organism

label: ventral side
definition: view of the side ventral to the frontal plane of a bilaterally symmetric organism

label: upper side
definition: view of the side of the part oriented toward the central axis of a plant (adaxial)
usage: In plants, use this term rather than "dorsal". For types of plants or fungi having horizontal parts and lacking a clear central axis, this is the surface away from the ground.
notes: BSPO has adaxial/abaxial axis http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BSPO_0000195 but not the sides defined by that axis

label: lower side
definition: view of the side of the part oriented away from the central axis of a plant (abaxial)
usage: In plants, use this term rather than "ventral". For types of plants or fungi having horizontal parts and lacking a clear central axis, this is the surface towards the ground.
notes: BSPO has adaxial/abaxial axis http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BSPO_0000195 but not the sides defined by that axis

label: apical side
definition: view of the side of the part oriented towards the end of the axis away from its attachment point (the apex)

label: basal side
definition: view of the side of the part oriented towards the attachment point of the axis

label: oral side
definition: view of the side of the organism oriented towards the oral opening

label: aboral side
definition: view of the side of the organism oriented away from the oral opening
